alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 12 at 10:34AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surfs of 10 to 12 feet, increasing to 11 to 13 feet tonight, will continue to impact south and east facing shores due to a large southerly swell and moderate to fresh tradewinds. * TIMING...Through the new week * IMPACTS...strong rip currents and large surfs. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1045 AM TAEAO ASO LUA IULAI 12 2022 ...O loo fa`aauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU... O galu e 10 i le 12 futu le maualuluga o le a siisii i le 11 i le 13 futu i le po nanei, ma o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e ona o a`uma tetele mai saute fa`apea le agi malosi o le tuaoloa. * TAIMI...Seia oo i le vaiaso fou. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E malosi aave o le sami ma e maualuluga galu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
